output:
  html_document:
    theme: united
    highlight: textmate
---

```{r echo=FALSE}
# Set up default dimensions. Width and height are multiplied by dpi to get
# pixel dimensions.
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 4, fig.height = 3)
```

To knit this document and render it to HTML:

```{r eval=FALSE}
rmarkdown::render("html_document.Rmd")
```

To embed a ggvis plot just call `ggvis`:

```{r}
library(ggvis)
ggvis(mtcars, props(x = ~wt, y = ~mpg)) + layer_point()
```


```{r, fig.width = 8, fig.height = 6}
ggvis(mtcars, props(x = ~wt, y = ~mpg)) +
  layer_point() +
  layer_smooth()
```
